pullRequest.title: Change APK base name depending on the branch name for debug builds
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is it?

 Bug fix
 Feature
 Development improvement

Long description of the changes in your PR

Debug APKs are now named after their branch name as suggested by @opusforlife2  e.g. the debug APK for this branch is named NewPipe_apk_base_name-debug.apk
Release builds are not touched, as well as debug builds on dev and master branch.
Testing apk

not needed
Agreement

 I carefully read the contribution guidelines and agree to them.

a

nodes.bodyText:
Better to use normalizedWorkingBranch, as workingBranch could contain special characters not allowed in filenames.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            archivesBaseName = 'NewPipe_' + workingBranch
          
          
            
                            archivesBaseName = 'NewPipe_' + normalizedWorkingBranch
